thread.title: High school soccer: Hammond edges Heuvelton in girls soccer
thread.title_full: High school soccer: Hammond edges Heuvelton in girls soccer

title: High school soccer: Hammond edges Heuvelton in girls soccer
text:
A A 
POTSDAM â€” The Hammond girls soccer team took advantage of a 75th-minute own goal to win a 1-0 nonleague game over Heuvelton on Monday at Potsdam high school. 
Lilly Langtry stopped five shots for the Red Devils (13-0-1), who will host Edwards-Knox at 4 p.m. today. 
Kristi Donnelly finished with two saves for the Bulldogs (11-4).
